query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and user.name : mirtov8@yandex-team.ru and event_time < 2021-07-15
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and cloud.folder.name : mirtov-checkpoint
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and (user_agent.original.keyword: *YC/* or user_agent.original.keyword: *Terraform*)

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Connect admins from YC, Terraform

id: Yandexcloud: Connect admins from YC, Terraform

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and user.name : fdsgs
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and details.access_binding_deltas.access_binding.role_id: vpc.publicAdmin
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.network.*SecurityGroup

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Any create or update SG (security group)

id: Yandexcloud: Any create or update SG (security group)

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.compute.AddInstanceOneToOneNat

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Add public IP to VM

id: Yandexcloud: Add public IP to VM

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and details.product_ids: *

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Create instance with marketplace image

id: Yandexcloud: Create instance with marketplace image

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit. kms. *SymmetricKeyAccessBindings

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Bind access rights to KMS key

id: Yandexcloud: Bind access rights to KMS key

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and details.access_binding_deltas.access_binding.role_id: admin

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Bind IAM Admin role to resources

id: Yandexcloud: Bind IAM Admin role to resources

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: (yandex.cloud.audit.storage.BucketAclUpdate or yandex.cloud.audit.storage.BucketPolicyUpdate)

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Changes of S3 acl, policy

id: Yandexcloud: Changes of S3 acl, policy

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateImage and cloud.image.source_uri: *

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Create image from S3 uri

id: Yandexcloud: Create image from S3 uri

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and (event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.network.CreateSecurityGroup or yandex.cloud.audit.network.UpdateSecurityGroup) and details.rules.direction: INGRESS and details.rules.cidr_blocks.v4_cidr_blocks: *0.0.0.0*
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action:  yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance and details.network_interfaces.index: 1
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action:  yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance and details.network_interfaces.primary_v4_address.one_to_one_nat.address: *
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action:  (yandex.cloud.audit.iam.CreateAccessKey or yandex.cloud.audit.iam.CreateKey or andex.cloud.audit.iam.CreateApiKey)
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and error.message: Permission denied
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.network.CreateAddress and not details.external_ipv4_address.requirements.ddos_protection_provider: qrator
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.outcome : success and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance and details.metadata_serial_port_enable: 1
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.outcome : success and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance and not details.network_interfaces.security_group_ids: *
